messages.body:
Dearest, Please do reply me because i know that this
mail might be strange to you since you don't know me
before.also send me your direct mail to reach you.
It is mypleasure to contact you for a business
venture which Iintend to establish in your country.
Though I have notmet with you before but I believe,
one has to take risk in confiding to succeed
sometimes in life. There is this huge amount of
Twelve million, seven hundred thousand U.S dollars
(US$ 12.700.000) which my late Father kept for me
with a FiduciaryFund Holder in Bostwana before he
was assasinated by unknownpersons during this war in
Ivory Coast. Before his death hedeposited in a
financial firm in Gaborone the Capital City of
Bostwana.Now I have decided to invest these money in
your country oranywhere safe enough outside Africa
for security andpolitical reasons.I want you to help
me claim and retrievethese fund from the Fiduciary
Fund Holders and transfer itinto your personal
account in your country for 
investmentpurposes on these areas:1)
Telecommunication 2) The Transport Industry 3) Five
Star Hotel 4) Real Estate Management5)
Commerce6)Import and ExportIf you can be of an
assistance to me I will be pleased tooffer to you
10% Of the total fund. I await your
soonestresponse.PLEASE SEND ME YOUR CONTACT DETAILS
AND PHONE NUMBERSBest RegardWetego KadirNOTE: YOU
CAN READ ABOUT PROBLEMS IN COTE D" IVOIRE FROM
THELINKS BELOW

http://abidjan.net/http://abidjan.net/actualites/reportages/crise_ci_20041105/galerie/ivoire.htm

http://abidjan.net/actualites/reportages/crise_ci_20041105/galerie/pillage.htm

http://abidjan.net/actualites/reportages/crise_ci_20041105/galerie/manifestants.htm

http://abidjan.net/actualites/reportages/crise_ci_20041105/galerie/regroupement.htm
messages.raw:
[Paragraph markings graciously provided by Scamorama, as the scammer du jour has apparently not learned about them in school.]

Wetego Kadir

Dearest,
Please do reply me because i know that this mail might be strange to you since you don't know me before.also send me your direct mail to reach you.
It is mypleasure to contact you for a business venture which Iintend to establish in your country. Though I have notmet with you before but I believe, one has to take risk in confiding to succeed sometimes in life.
There is this huge amount of Twelve million, seven hundred thousand U.S dollars (US$ 12.700.000) which my late Father kept for me with a FiduciaryFund Holder in Bostwana before he was assasinated by unknownpersons during this war in Ivory Coast. Before his death hedeposited in a financial firm in Gaborone the Capital City of Bostwana.
Now I have decided to invest these money in your country oranywhere safe enough outside Africa for security andpolitical reasons.I want you to help me claim and retrievethese fund from the Fiduciary Fund Holders and transfer itinto your personal account in your country for investmentpurposes on these areas:
1) Telecommunication
2) The Transport Industry
3) Five Star Hotel
4) Real Estate Management
5) Commerce
6)Import and Export

If you can be of an assistance to me I will be pleased tooffer to you 10% Of the total fund. I await your soonestresponse.
PLEASE SEND ME YOUR CONTACT DETAILS AND PHONE NUMBERS

Best RegardWetego Kadir

NOTE: YOU CAN READ ABOUT PROBLEMS IN COTE D" IVOIRE FROM THELINKS BELOW

messages.body:
Dear Sir  How are you doing,i hope fine.i know that
my mail will be a very big surprise to you because
you may find it unsolicited due to the fact that you
don't know me.Am from Ivory Coast in Western Africa
a war ravaged country.Am a young girl of 23 years
old and am here in Bostwana with my mother and
younger brother just to effect the transfer of my
late fathers fund which he kept here with a
financial firm. The reason why i contacted you is
that i want you to help me in tranfering this amount
of money to your personal bank account so that i and
my mother and my little brother can come over for
investment purposes,please we are saddled about this
matter and we want you to help us with a sincere and
honest mind because we dont want to loose our money
our lives depends on this fund. Based on your
willingness to assist us we will give you the
contact details of the financial firm for you to
contact them,we will present you as our foriegn
partner because that is what my late 
father wrote in his will and also in some of the
document he made with the bank,HE STATED THAT THIS
MONEY SHOULD BE TRANSFERED OUT OF AFRICA to avoid
trace and government problems. However,my father
before he was assasinated he succeeded in
transfering about $3.5Million dollars to a Business
man in Saudi Arabia but the man betrayed my father
after when the money has reached his account so that
is how the money got lost so we don't want to fall a
victim again. Hope to hear from you soonest,please i
have attached two of my photos for you. Note-This
transaction is 100% risk free the money belongs to
my late father who was a Local chief in my Region
and also a properous diamond dealer,please send me
your contact details,phone and fax numbers,if you
will be willing to assist us we will compesate you
with 10% of the total amount of money.Here is my
alternate email also wetego_kadir@yahoo.fr Yours
faithfullyMiss Wetego Vivian Kadir
messages.raw:
Wetego Kadir

Dear Sir
How are you doing,i hope fine.i know that my mail will be a very big surprise to you because you may find it unsolicited due to the fact that you don't know me.
Am from Ivory Coast in Western Africa a war ravaged country.Am a young girl of 23 years old and am here in Bostwana with my mother and younger brother just to effect the transfer of my late fathers fund which he kept here with a financial firm.
The reason why i contacted you is that i want you to help me in tranfering this amount of money to your personal bank account so that i and my mother and my little brother can come over for investment purposes,please we are saddled about this matter and we want you to help us with a sincere and honest mind because we dont want to loose our money our lives depends on this fund.
Based on your willingness to assist us we will give you the contact details of the financial firm for you to contact them,we will present you as our foriegn partner because that is what my late father wrote in his will and also in some of the document he made with the bank,HE STATED THAT THIS MONEY SHOULD BE TRANSFERED OUT OF AFRICA to avoid trace and government problems.
However,my father before he was assasinated he succeeded in transfering about $3.5Million dollars to a Business man in Saudi Arabia but the man betrayed my father after when the money has reached his account so that is how the money got lost so we don't want to fall a victim again.
Hope to hear from you soonest,please i have attached two of my photos for you.
Note-This transaction is 100% risk free the money belongs to my late father who was a Local chief in my Region and also a properous diamond dealer,please send me your contact details,phone and fax numbers,if you will be willing to assist us we will compesate you with 10% of the total amount of money.
Here is my alternate email also wetego_kadir@yahoo.fr
Yours faithfully
Miss Wetego Vivian Kadir

messages.body:
(wetego_kadir@yahoo.fr)

Dear Stroganov

  Thank you for the interest you have shown in other
to help us out in transfering this money out of
Africa.i believe in the promises of God "For with
God all things are possible"Mark10-27. I hope you
got my photo in my previous mail.Am a Christian and
i beleive in honesty and truth because these are the
basic things required for a Godly life.I cannot tell
lies or do anything that will make me fee guilty of
myself,i strongly obey the 10 commandments of God
like my parents taught me,Please what is your
religion?.

  Presently i and my mother are currenlty in the
Refugee camp as a refugee been taken care by
UNHCR(United nation high commision for refugees) we
came to Bostwana because of this deposit which my
father kept here with the fiduciary firm,nobody
knows about it except me and my mother and you that
we will present as our foriegn partner.I want you to
handle this matter with one heart(seriuonesness and
truth) as we have already mapped out 10% for your
compensation.

  As for the evidence it is very sure because as
soon as the money gets to your domiciliary account
in Russia you will then send us an invitation letter
which we will use in obtaining our visas to
Russia.like i have said before their is no risk
involved this money belongs to my late father he got
it through his hard work and sweat that is why we
don't want to joke with it sir.and i have all the
documents partaining to the deposits with my mother
it was done with my name as the bonafide
beneficiary.

As a result of our prayers to God yesterday we
wholeheartedly have the faith to open up for you,You
can contact the financial firm and inform them about
the transfer of the deposit,tell them that you are
our foriegn partner in Russia that you want to
transfer the deposit which my late father made with
them(that entails my name as the beneficiary)

  DEPOSITOR NAME-DR BEN YAHIYA KADIR
DEPOSIT CODE O/T/S/FC 4572604/BYK/069-BW

  OPTIMUM TRUST SECURITY AND FINANCE  LTD 
  PLOT 21087,G-WEST.P O BOX 8745
GABORONE, BOSTWANA
TEL/FAX +267-7219-2223                              

  EMAIL:optimumtrustsec_fin@mail2world.com

  Please when that is done ,you inform us as soon as
possible
  I still awaits your contact details
  Your loving daughter
Wetego

messages.body:
Dear sir


  Thank you very much for your reply to my mail,i
hope everything is moving fine for you .Am very
happy to hear that you are a christian too.Is your
church a protestant or Orthodox church?what is the
denomination,What do you do for a living and how old
are you ?.

  Last time i sent you my photos didn't you see
it,ok am going to send it to you again for you to
see who is communicating with you.

  However,i have to answer your question.The refugee
camp doesn't have an internet access i do check my
mails outside the camp close to our church.

  PLEASE I WANT TO KNOW YOUR WILLINGNESS TO HELP US
OUT IN THIS MATTER,WE WANT TO KNOW IF YOU ARE
SERIOUS ABOUT ASSISTING US IN THE TRANSFER OF THIS
FUND TO RUSSIA AND ALSO TO HELP US IN INVESTING IT.


  Hope to hear from you soonest.
Yours faithfully
Wetego

Last time i sent you my photos didn't you see it,ok am going to send it to you again for you to see who is communicating with you.

messages.body:
Dear Strognov

  Good day to you,how are you doing,i hope fine.i
don't understand  what you mean that you are happy
to contact DR YAHOO KADIR who is he?did i tell you
about DR YAHOO KADIR.Am a devoted christain,i was
born into a christian family where Godly standard is
practiced,am still young,never married and i hope to
get married to a christain too somebody who will
love me and care for me.

  From the way you react and answer me i don't see
any sign of seriouness in you in this
transaction,because i don't want to waste my time
communicating with you since you are not willing to
assist me because my aged mother is worried about
this matter.I told you to contact the financial firm
and ask them the modalities for the transfer of the
deposit but you haven't how then will i know that
you are willing to assist us.I called the Financial
director to ask him if you have contact them from
Russia but they said no,so what is the background of
your assistance to us.

  I also asked you to send me your phone and fax
numbers but you refused not even your bank
details,HOW WILL I KNOW THAT YOU WANT TO HELP ME OUT
IN TRANSFERING THE STATED FUND OUT OF AFRICA.

  Answer my questions and get back to me.PLEASE
INDICATE YOUR WILLINGNESS TO HELP US OUT,OR SHOULD
WE LOOK FOR ANOTHER PERSON ?

  Worried girl
Wetego

messages.body:
FRIENDS AND COLLEAGUES

JUST TO REASSURE YOU THAT I HAVE NOT BEEN BITTEN BY
THE RELIGIOUS BUG_I AM NOT EVEN CHRISTIAN AND HAVE A
HEALTHY DEGREE OF CYNICISM TO ALL ORGANISED RELIGIONS
THOUGH I FULLY RESPECT OTHERS' RIGHT TO BELIEF_I ALSO
MEAN NO OFFENCE TO MY CHRISTIAN ANTI-419 OPERATIVES
AND AM IN NO WAY MOCKING THE CHRISTIAN FAITH HERE_I AM
MERELY THROWING THEIR FALSE RELIGIOUS BELIEFS BACK IN
THE LADS' FACES TO TRY TO DELAY THINGS_KEEP THE
CUSTARD BOILING

 - - - S 
:
Mikhail

Firstly, I am glad to hear you haven't become some kind of zealot over the last few weeks. Keep up the good work with Wet Ego and the baka from Emirates.

Secondly I apoligize for my absense the last couple of days. Even Munglers needs a break from time to time and had a splendid time relaxing near the coast.

I hope to be able to pick up where everything was left soon.

Remain blessed
Phil

GOOD TO HEAR FROM YOU_WELCOME BACK SIR_I HAVE HEARD
ALL ABOUT YOUR ADVENTURES AND EXPLOITS ON SMEGAROON
ISLAND_VLADIMIR'S CHIEF BARMAID IRINA WISHES TO KNOW
IF YOU ARE GOING TO CALL HER AND THAT YOU LEFT YOUR
WATCH ON HER BEDSIDE TABLE_I LEAVE THOSE PARTICULAR
MODALITIES TO YOU_REGARDING THE STREET RACING ON
BOWDEN BOULEVARD FORTUNATELY THE SMEGAROON POLICE
CHIEF IS AN OLD SCHOOL FRIEND SO HE WILL SAY NO MORE
ABOUT IT_KEEP THE CUSTARD BOILING AND REGARDS FROM
DOWNTOWN MOSCOW

Firstly, I am glad to hear you haven't become some kind of zealot over the last few weeks. Keep up the good work with Wet Ego and the baka from Emirates.
Secondly I apoligize for my absense the last couple of days. Even Munglers needs a break from time to time and had a splendid time relaxing near the coast.
I hope to be able to pick up where everything was left soon.
Remain blessed

Dear Stroganov

  Greetings in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ,I
told you that you should contact the bank where the
money was kept and tell them that you want to
transfer it to Russia (i have already told them that
you are our foriegn partner).i have told you this
morethan twice still you don't understand or don't
you really want to assist me.

  Find the contact details of the bank where the
deposit was made. You have to contact them through
their email address or by phone today.

  DEPOSITOR NAME-DR BEN YAHIYA KADIR
DEPOSIT CODE O/T/S/FC 4572604/BYK/069-BW

 OPTIMUM TRUST SECURITY AND FINANCE LTD 
 PLOT 21087,G-WEST.P O BOX 8745
GABORONE, BOSTWANA
TEL/FAX +267-7219-2223 

  Email..........optimumtrustsec_fin@mail2world.com

  After contacting the bank  you should inform me.
  Send me your phone numbers.

  Yours in christ
Wetego

messages.body:
Dear MIkhail Stroganov
  Greetings to you,i hope everything is moving fine
with you ovethere .Thank you very much for your
interest in replying my mail,How is your family i
hope they are living in good health.If so Glory be
to God Almighty.

  Please when you get a reply from the bank you
should let me know immediatley so that i can inform
my mother as soonest.
  Wishing you a blessed day full of God's love and
blessings
  Your christian daughter
  Wetego Kadir

messages.body:
DEAR MIKHAIL

  THANK GOD THAT YOU HAVE HEARD FROM THE FINANCIAL 
FIRM.WHAT DID THEY SAY?WHAT WAS THIER REPLY,PLEASE
LET ME KNOW AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

  THERE IS SOMETHING I WANT TO LET YOU KNOW,ABOUT
THIS TRANSACTION,THE MONEY WAS DEPOSITED INSIDE A
TRUNK BOX AND KEPT WITH THE FINANCIAL FIRM AS A
FAMILY TREASURE.I HAVE ATTACHED THE PHOTOGRAPH OF
THE MONEY FOR YOU TO SEE BEFORE IT WAS DEPOSITED AND
THE MANAGEMENT DOESN'T KNOW THE CONTENT PLEASE
WHENEVER YOU ARE COMMUNICATING WITH THE FINANCIAL
DIRECTOR DON'T EVER LET HIM KNOW THAT WHAT THE
CONSIGNMENT IS CARRYING CONTAINS MONEY BECAUSE THAT
WILL CAUSE A LITTLE PROBLEM FOR ME ACCORDING TO THE
DEPOSIT AGREEMENT MY LATE FATHER MADE WITH THEM.

  HOWEVER THE MANAGEMENT OF THE FINANCIAL FIRM
DOESN''T KNOW THE CONTENT OF THE BOX BECAUSE MY LATE
FATHER DID NOT DISCLOSE THAT TO THEM AND THEY ARE
GOING TO TRANSFER THE CONSIGNMENT LIKE THAT TO YOU
IN RUSSIA.

  SO GET BACK TO ME AS SOON AS POSSIBLE AND ALSO
SEND ME YOUR PHONE NUMBER BECAUSE I WANT TO HEAR
FROM YOU.

  YOURS IN CHRIST
  WETEGO KADIR
